derivation: or עָווֹן; (2 Kings 7:9; Psalm 51:5 (H7 (אֲבַד))), from H5753 (עָוָה);
outline:
1. perversity, depravity, iniquity, guilt or punishment of iniquity
    1. iniquity
    2. guilt of iniquity, guilt (as great), guilt (of condition)
    3. consequence of or punishment for iniquity
kjv_def: fault, iniquity, mischeif, punishment (of iniquity), sin.
